select (select curr_date from ttrd_currdate) as 日期, i.i_name as 机构名称, ii.org_id as 机构号, tr.ord_id as 审批单号, tr_type.description as 业务种类, ii.CORE_SYS_CUSTOMER_CODE as 客户号, ii.i_fullname as 客户全称, dic.dict_value as 币种, TRIM(to_char(cast((tr.ordamount) as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 金额, TRIM(to_char(cast(tr.bnd_ytm * 100 as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.9999')) as 年利率, case when cashExt.payment_freq = '0D' then '利随本清' when cashExt.payment_freq = '1Y' then '每年一次' when cashExt.payment_freq = '6M' then '半年一次' when cashExt.payment_freq = '3M' then '每季一次' when cashExt.payment_freq = '1M' then '每月一次' when cashExt.payment_freq = '-1' then '不结息' end as 付息频率, tr.operator as 经办人, tr.party_bank_name as 开户行名称, tr.party_bank_code as 开户行号, tr.party_acct_name as 活期账户名称, tr.party_acct_code as 活期账户, cash.accname as 内部账户, TRIM(to_char(cast(tr.due_cp as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 应收本金, TRIM(to_char(cast(tr.due_ai as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 应收利息, TRIM(to_char(cast((tr.due_cp+tr.due_ai) as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 应收金额, TRIM(to_char(cast(tr.real_cp as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 实收本金, TRIM(to_char(cast(tr.real_ai as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 实收利息, TRIM(to_char(cast(tr.ordamount as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 实收金额, 'A/360' as 计息基准
FROM TTRD_OTC_TRADE tr left join ttrd_acc_cash cash on tr.cp_cash_accid=cash.accid left join ttrd_acc_cash_ext cashExt on tr.party_zzdacccode=cashExt.accid LEFT JOIN ttrd_auth_user u on tr.operator_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN TTRD_INSTITUTION i ON u.i_id = TO_CHAR(i.i_id) left join ttrd_institution ii on tr.partyid = ii.i_id LEFT JOIN ttrd_trade_type tr_type on tr.trdtype = tr_type.trd_type left join ttrd_instrument instrument on tr.i_code = instrument.i_code left join ttrd_dict_mult_lang dic on instrument.currency = dic.dict_key and dic.dict_sub_type='currency' where tr.ord_id = (select distinct trr.ord_id FROM TTRD_OTC_TRADE trr where trr.sysordid = #{sysOrdId}) and tr.ref_sysordid is null and tr.ordstatus<0
